name: read symbols
desc: Creates symbolic representations of different borehole identifiers based on a set of user defined parameters.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Z Offset
properties.desc: The Z Offset value will move the symbol vertically.

properties.name: Black White Contrast
properties.desc: The Black White Contrast value sets the contrast between light and dark colors produced. A value of .50 (default) makes the lightest color .75 gray and the darkest color .25 gray. A value of 1.0 would make white and black.

properties.name: Radius Scaling
properties.desc: The Radius Scaling value is used to scale the radius of the symbol based on user units. The symbols overall size is affected by this parameter.

properties.name: Ring Thickness
properties.desc: The Ring Thickness parameter sets the outline thickness of the first polygon.
